transcripts.text: Well, my next guest, redefined Christian comedy with his breakout album called Put a Helmet On.  Would you please welcome the man that New Yorker magazine called God's comic, Brad Stein.

What?  Come on.  I want to hear you now, Jim.  Thank you.  That's what I like to hear.  I love it.  I love the South, and I'm going to tell you why.  You go to church.  You go to church.  You go to church.  And you know what else is great?  The men go to church in Tennessee.  And when they go, they're packing.  And you don't apologize for it.  And that's why I love this.  That's America.  You remember the Judeo-Christian values that made us great?  You remember that Jesus Christ is God?  Oh, I am sick up to here!  With the politically correct, don't shoot the animals, they might get their feelings hurt.  See the bunny, shoot it, eat it, make a hat!  That's a cute bunny.  Yeah, that sure was a cute bunny.  See the bunny, shoot it, eat it, make a hat.  God bless you guys for coming out on this night.
